name: Pixel GP - The Oval Challenge
description:
Classic 90s Style arcade racing with Chip Tunes provided by Nicole Marie  T. 4 racing views, this is a demo challenge on the Oval Circuit. Feedback and any support greatly appreciated! 

MORE TRACKS, MONSTER TRUCKS , STEAM VERSION and playmodes coming  to the FREE VERSION (arcade edition) VERY SOON ! :0) . Follow @rozeybozzy on Twitter for more updates!

A pre-alpha demo of the oval track in arcade mode. More tracks, play modes and vehicles in development. Your feedback much appreciated. Help support this game https://ko-fi.com/rozeybozzy and register your interest for the "Champioship Edition" https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/--163458/coming_soon/x/24961714

 CONTROLS- KEYBOARD- Arrow keys to steer, accelerate and brake left CTRL fire/ change view.

Xbox ONE (PC controller) left stick steer. Button A accelerate Button X break Button Y change view.

Escape to quit.
